actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to require 5 year vesting for employees in a multiemployer plan who are covered pursuant to a collective bargaining agreement.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to require five-year vesting for employees in multiemployer pension plans who are covered by collective bargaining agreements. (Currently, ten year vesting is required.)

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to require 5 year vesting for employees in a multiemployer plan who are covered pursuant to a collective bargaining agreement.
